name: part_000
file: tmp_【ハロウィンお披露目3D】#そらのハロウィンパーティー【全力で楽しんでいこう！】 [8aqY3tf4Zcg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence with a static title image for 'Sora No Halloween Party' and background music.
3D performance section where Tokino Sora sings 'Vampire' on a virtual stage.

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire

subtitles.original: いいの？吸っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: Is it okay? Can I take a bite?

subtitles.original: 「もう無理、もう無理」なんて
subtitles.english: Saying "I can't take it anymore"

subtitles.original: 悪い子だね
subtitles.english: You're such a bad boy

subtitles.original: 試したいな　いっぱいで吐き出したいほど
subtitles.english: I want to try, so much that I want to spit it out

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: We can definitely still go on

subtitles.original:
ヴァンパイア
作詞・作曲 DECO*27
subtitles.english:
Vampire
Lyrics/Composition: DECO*27

subtitles.original: 斉唱？最高？ずっとイキイキしてる
subtitles.english: Unison? The best? Always feeling lively

subtitles.original: 甘くなる不安の果実
subtitles.english: The ripening fruit of anxiety

subtitles.original: No more 反省？じっと息をしてても
subtitles.english: No more regrets? Even if I'm just breathing quietly

subtitles.original: いらないだけ　うるさいだけ
subtitles.english: I just don't need it, it's just noisy

subtitles.original: 誰かと居れば　それはそれでマレば
subtitles.english: If I'm with someone, and if that happens to be...

subtitles.original: 強がってたって気持ちにゃ逆らえない
subtitles.english: Even if I act tough, I can't resist my feelings

subtitles.original: 離れていても　感じてるよでも
subtitles.english: Even if we're apart, I can feel it, but

subtitles.original: 強がって確かめたら死ねるかも
subtitles.english: If I act tough and make sure, I might just die

subtitles.original: いいもん　悲しいもん
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's just sad

subtitles.original: 切ないもん
subtitles.english: It's just painful

subtitles.original: 君のすべてを喰らうまで
subtitles.english: Until I devour every part of you

subtitles.original: 絶叫！
subtitles.english: Scream!

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire

subtitles.original: いいの？吸っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: Is it okay? Can I take a bite?

subtitles.original: 「もう無理、もう無理」なんて
subtitles.english: Saying "I can't take it anymore"

subtitles.original: 悪い子だね
subtitles.english: You're such a bad boy

subtitles.original: 試したいな　いっぱいで吐き出したいほど
subtitles.english: I want to try, so much that I want to spit it out

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: We can definitely still go on

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア　求めちゃってまた晒しちゃって悪い感じ
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire, seeking and exposing, it feels bad

subtitles.original: 泣いて　忘れたら「はじめまして」
subtitles.english: If I cry and forget, then "Nice to meet you"

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア　愛情をください　喉が渇いて
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire, give me love, I'm thirsty

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: We can definitely still go on

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア　まずはこっちおいで
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire, first, come over here

subtitles.original: 内緒の想い　淡いザワザワ
subtitles.english: Secret feelings, a faint rustle

subtitles.original: 吐き出したなら　まさに馬鹿ばかり
subtitles.english: If I let them out, it's just full of idiots

subtitles.original: 割り切れないけど　余りじゃない
subtitles.english: Can't divide it evenly, but it's not a leftover

subtitles.original: そっと朝まで通せんぼ
subtitles.english: Softly blocking the way until morning

subtitles.original: 繰り返す嫌だ　わがままはただ
subtitles.english: Repeating the "I don't want to", selfishness is just...

subtitles.original: 欲張ってまたチャンスを逃すのだ
subtitles.english: Being greedy and missing the chance again

subtitles.original: やまないもしも　叶えたいけど
subtitles.english: An endless "what if", I want it to come true, but

subtitles.original: 重なって押しつぶされちゃうのかな
subtitles.english: Will I get piled up and crushed?

subtitles.original: いいもん　悲しいもん
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's just sad

subtitles.original: 切ないもん
subtitles.english: It's just painful

subtitles.original: 君のすべてを喰らうまで
subtitles.english: Until I devour every part of you

subtitles.original: いいじゃん　楽しいじゃん
subtitles.english: Isn't it fine? Isn't it fun?

subtitles.original: 気持ちいいじゃん
subtitles.english: Doesn't it feel good?

subtitles.original: 溺れるまでが癖になるね
subtitles.english: It becomes a habit until I drown

subtitles.original: 絶叫！
subtitles.english: Scream!

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire

subtitles.original: いいの？吸っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: Is it okay? Can I take a bite?

subtitles.original: 「もう無理、もう無理」なんて
subtitles.english: Saying "I can't take it anymore"

subtitles.original: 悪い子だね
subtitles.english: You're such a bad boy

subtitles.original: 試したいな　いっぱいで吐き出したいほど
subtitles.english: I want to try, so much that I want to spit it out

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: We can definitely still go on

subtitles.original: きみもヴァンパイア
subtitles.english: You're a vampire too

subtitles.original: いいよ？吸っちゃっていいよ？
subtitles.english: Is it okay? You can take a bite

subtitles.original: 「もう無理、もう無理」だって
subtitles.english: Even if you say "I can't take it anymore"

subtitles.original: 言わせてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to say it

subtitles.original: きみがいないんじゃ　絶対いけない
subtitles.english: If you're not here, I definitely can't go on

subtitles.original: ほら延長させてよ
subtitles.english: Come on, let me extend this

subtitles.original: きみもヴァンパイア　求めちゃってまた晒しちゃって悪い感じ
subtitles.english: You're a vampire too, seeking and exposing, it feels bad

subtitles.original: 何回目？　星が見えるような泡の中で
subtitles.english: How many times now? In a bubble where I can see stars

subtitles.original: きみもヴァンパイア　延長をください　まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: You're a vampire too, give me an extension, we can still go on

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: We can definitely still go on

subtitles.original: きみもヴァンパイア　まずはこっちおいで
subtitles.english: You're a vampire too, first, come over here

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: We can definitely still go on
